availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram McGehee (Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter and master builder)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter and master builder. Virginia native. Son of James McGehee and Jane McGehee. Married to Verinda Barrackman McGehee on February 17, 1850. Father of James S. McGehee Carpenter in Louisville in 1850. Master Builder in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, 2nd District of Louisville, p. 157B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, City of Louisville, p. 94.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482707, p. 80.
